programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dave finds a very rare 70s Sunbeam Lotus that has been rotting away in a farmyard for 29 years, while a Morris Minor convertible goes under the hammer.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.desc: A secret weapons program in the heart of Austria that could have ended badly for the Allies - and may have indicated nuclear plans being concocted by Hitler.

programme.title: Walking Through History
programme.sub-title: Walking Through History: Victoria and Albert's Highland Fling
programme.desc: Tony Robinson visits the Cairngorms National Park to discover how Queen Victoria and Prince Albert helped shape Scottish traditions and imagery, such as tartan, bagpipes and caber-tossing. Starting in Pitlochry, he traverses the Killiecrankie Pass, where the Jacobites won the Battle of Killiecrankie, and ends his trek at Balmoral and the fantasy castle Albert built as his and Victoria's Highland escape.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Sam is not convinced a sports agent committed suicide, after a post-mortem reveals she was in the early stages of pregnancy and bruising to her arms suggests a sexual assault. Matters are complicated further when a client she was planning a new life with is found dead in her flat and tests reveal the father of her baby is Caucasian, putting her husband back in the frame, despite his alibi.

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Part two of two. Dale Smith ignores a warning from lover Louise to save his own skin and foolishly continues searching Larson's home for the gun used in the Garrison shooting. When he fails to show up at Sun Hill, Nadir is forced to tell Jack Meadows what has been going on. Roger Valentine makes fun of Tony Stamp's hearing problem, but a routine check-up at the hospital proves anything but funny.

programme.title: London's Burning
programme.desc: Blue Watch are called to rescue a familiar face, and a collapsing building traps an elderly woman. Starring Andrew Kazamia and Glen Murphy.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.desc: A summary of the latest news headlines.

programme.title: Press Preview
programme.desc: A preview of the stories appearing in tomorrow's national newspapers.

programme.title: ITV Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: Late Night Magic
programme.desc: We're taking you all the way through the night with soem of the best tracks of all time.

programme.title: Kisstory: Old Skool & Anthems
programme.desc: It's time to go back in time with KISSTORY! The biggest old skool anthems ever from your favourite artists.

programme.title: Up All Night! Kiss Beats
programme.desc: Let the world sleep! But here at Kiss we are still up, still delivering the finest beats for your nocturnal jam.

programme.title: Chart Hits & New Vids
programme.desc: We've got all the hits that are storming the charts right now, along with some brand new releases from your favourite and new artists.

programme.title: All The Hits, All Night
programme.desc: Non-stop hits to see you all the way through the night.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike Brewer sets out to buy a Ford Sierra Cosworth on a budget of only Â£5,000, before handing it over to mechanic Edd China for extensive renovation work.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Ploughing through a 40-acre salvage yard, junk experts Mike Wolfe and Frank Fritz harvest a few lost treasures, including a never-before-seen farmer's mini-bike.

programme.title: American Chopper
programme.sub-title: FANtasy Bike - Joseph McClendon and Brian King
programme.desc: The guys visit FANtasy winner Joseph McClendon, who sold his bike to pay for his mother's medical treatment. Now, Paulie and the guys are giving this die-hard OCC fan the chance to get back on the road. They also The guys visit the final bike winner, Brian King, a born-and-raised chopper-lover who was left a paraplegic by a car accident.

programme.title: Aircraft Stories
programme.desc: The development of Russian fighter planes from the time of Tsar Nicholas II to the modern day, the documentary highlights designs that have left Western developers stunned.

programme.title: Dirty Jobs
programme.desc: Mike Rowe is shown how to make luxury pillows in Tulelake using goose down, and then he finds out how to harvest walnuts.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: The processes involved in manufacturing three-wheel vehicles, baseball bats, artificial bonsai and trombones, and how these methods have changed with technology.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: The methods involved in making springs and pianos, and how they have changed with advances in technology.

programme.title: Forensic Detectives
programme.desc: Police use trace evidence and paint analysis to track down a killer preying on male prostitutes. Saliva and ink found at the scene of a murder help link a husband to his estranged wife's death.

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: In 2016 car salesman Hufracio Arteaga was found stabbed to death in his Michigan City office. Surveillance cameras at a nearby building offered hope in catching his killer.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: The fatal shooting of the sheriff of Cleveland, Oklahoma. Law enforcement determined to find justice for their fellow officer.

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: The case of a girl who was abducted while camping with her family, examining the phone call on the anniversary of her disappearance that led to the culprit's conviction.

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: A police homicide inquiry uncovers seven emaciated dogs in the backyard of a house. Plus, investigators have to catch scores of starving chickens.

programme.title: Bondi Vet
programme.desc: Harriet the Bearded Dragon has a worrying lump on the side of her leg that requires an urgent operation, and a sick 10-week-old puppy is put in danger by her protective owner.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids
programme.sub-title: A Tale of Two Bridesmaids' Dresses
programme.desc: Bride Julie is fighting with her party because she wants two different dresses - one for bridesmaids and one for the honorary bridesmaids.
